name: INSTITUTIONAL EXCELLENCE FORUM
briefDescription: When the Institutional Excellence Forum (IEF) was conceived in 2013, with the agenda of enabling an excellence attitude in pursuits across India, it was apparent that the place to begin was Education.With an aim to address India’s School drop-out problem, IEF is setting up Career Excellence Centres (CECs) within the premises of Senior Secondary schools. This will help students, access up-to-date career information and nurture an understanding attitude towards Excellence.As of date the unique CEC model has done 3 pilots in 3 states across30 schools, involving 3000+ students, 24 teachers and the school managements.Career Excellence Centre (CEC) has been recognised as “The Best Career Guidance & Counseling Platform 2016” by ASSOCHAM
